content: knitted your mini jumper fold in half matching the sleeve and side hems together then stitch at the sides to finish get creative and make up your own jumper motifs what designs can you create on your mini jumper bunting once you ve made all your mini jumpers simply thread ribbon or yarn through the jumper arms to string them up into beautiful bunting share it with the world we can t wait to see you showing off your crafty creations just post a pic on facebook twitter and instagram and remember to tag all your posts #teamcreate and #xmasjumperday facebook com/christmasjumperday @savechildrenuk savechildrenuk discover more of sue s patterns at theknittinghut co uk photos ivy lahon/save the children
